attributes.action: bring in a law that youths caught carrying knifes and guns should be made to join the services
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background: any youths that are caught carrying knifes should be given the choose either jail or a chance to serve their country as serveing personnel in the armed services ,the length should be a total of five years service ,and if they do not make the grade prison sentance is served

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
